parameters:
If you go up the stairs to the side, you'll find the guest
rooms. Please make yourself comfortable.

This Atami is a historic hot spring resort where even the
first shogun of the shogunate bathed. You should take a dip
in the hot springs as a memento.

Welcome to the Atami hot spring inn. For [2000 mon], you can
use the facilities as many times as you like. Will you be
staying with us?\$

Thank you very much. If you wish to rest, please use the
room at the back on the second floor. The hot spring is
located at the back on the left side.

--\c[17]【Hot Spring Bath Ticket】\c[0] acquired! You can now
stay at the hot spring inn!
Did you come from Edo? Well, welcome from such a far place.

The bathhouse is further inside. Please be careful as the
water is hot.

Ah, hot springs are so nice...\I[15] Now, shall we take a
look at the precious fruits and ornaments for sale?

Thank you. Well, maybe I'll go back to the hot spring
again...

Yay! A hot spring inn! Let's all go take a bath together
right away♪

It's a genuine inn, isn't it? The atmosphere is so nice. I'm
sure the bathhouse must be lovely too.
...Do I have to join in the hot spring as well?

Of course. We've been fighting continuously, so it's
necessary to heal our wounds and deepen our bonds while
soaking in the hot springs, right?

--The three enjoyed the hot springs to their hearts'
content. \c[17]Everyone's skill power increased by 20!\c[0]

(I woke up in the middle of the night... Maybe I should go
take another bath.)
